name: Paris, France
description: The City of Light offers romance, culture, and incredible cuisine.
cuisine: Experience authentic French cuisine including croissants, macarons, escargot, and world-class wines.

name: Tokyo, Japan
description: Modern metropolis blending tradition with cutting-edge technology.
cuisine: Enjoy sushi, ramen, tempura, and more. Tokyo is a paradise for food lovers.

tripInfo.Best Time to Visit: March to May, October to November

name: New York, USA
description: The city that never sleeps, full of energy and endless possibilities.
cuisine: Explore global cuisines from street food to Michelin-starred restaurants.

tripInfo.Best Time to Visit: April to June, September to early November

name: Rome, Italy
description: A timeless city blending ancient ruins, Renaissance art, and mouthwatering cuisine.
cuisine: Delight in pasta carbonara, Roman pizza, gelato, and espresso.

tripInfo.Best Time to Visit: April to June, September to October

name: Cape Town, South Africa
description: A stunning coastal city nestled beneath Table Mountain.
cuisine: Try bobotie, braai, fresh seafood, and local wines.

tripInfo.Best Time to Visit: March to May, September to November

name: Sydney, Australia
description: Vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks and laid-back coastal lifestyle.
cuisine: Enjoy fresh seafood, multicultural fusion, and classic Aussie BBQ.

tripInfo.Best Time to Visit: September to November, March to May

name: Barcelona, Spain
description: A Mediterranean gem famous for its art, architecture, and beaches.
cuisine: Taste tapas, paella, churros, and cava.

tripInfo.Best Time to Visit: May to June, September to October

name: Dubai, UAE
description: A futuristic oasis in the desert with world-class luxury and innovation.
cuisine: Savor Middle Eastern mezze, shawarma, and global gourmet dining.

name: Greece
description: A land of ancient history, sun-drenched islands, and Mediterranean charm.
cuisine: Enjoy traditional Greek dishes like moussaka, souvlaki, tzatziki, fresh seafood, and baklava with ouzo or Greek wine.
